questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident or Damage or Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/BPL – CLEO PLUS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: Shift the equipment to another place where the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230
check and confirm whether power adapter voltage of 15VDC is available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking power adapter voltage

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the fuses are blown out.
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm is there any breakage or damage to the power input pin connector
replace the power input pin connector with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the pin connector

questions.question: check and confirm whether DC-DC Board output voltage is available.
repair or replace the DC – DC board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing DC – DC Board

questions.question: check for any loose connections or breakage of cables from DC -DC board to control board.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair or replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the SPO2 measurement fails.
check for any loose connection or damage of probe.
replace the probe properly or replace the probe with a new one
check for breakage or damage of probe pin connector.
replace the probe pin connector accordingly

videos.src: assets/videos/BPL – CLEO PLUS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR REPLACING PROBE PIN CONNECTOR.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR REPLACING PROBE PIN CONNECTOR

questions.question: repair or replace the Spo2  board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is black or plain.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from control board to display
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair or replace the backlight accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display appears as white screen.
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from backlight to display.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether some of the button or buttons do not respond until hard press.
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from keypad to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the Switch control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Switch control board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
